changelog.md.Pour rappel, s'il n'y a pas d'informatio: As a reminder, if there is no information on the update, it is because it only concerns the update of documentation, translation or text
changelog.md.Nouvelle version du fichier CGX V1.0.2: New version of CGX file V1.0.2
changelog.md.Ajout du paramètre \"Type de mesure\" po: Addition of the "Type of measurement" parameter for meters and TIC
changelog.md.Ajout d'une option de mise à jour automa: Addition of an automatic update option and a command to update the CGX file as well as a button allowing the update of all active servers

index.md.Ce plugin va vous permettre de prendre l: This plugin will allow you to take control of your
index.md.target=\"\\_blank\"} et d'en récupérer t: target = "\_ blank"} and recover all the data instantly in Jeedom
index.md.Comme tout plugin Jeedom, le plugin: Like any Jeedom plugin, the plugin
index.md.utilise son propre démon afin de rester: uses its own daemon in order to stay in constant contact with the Wes server
index.md.Vous pouvez en contrôler le statut sur l: You can check the status on the plugin configuration page
index.md.Il n'est pas nécessaire de se préoccuper: It is not necessary to worry about the state of the daemon as soon as the plugin is activated because the creation of the 1st Wes server equipment will automatically configure and start the daemon
index.md.Le plugin ne nécessite pas de configurat: The plugin does not require any particular configuration but offers a field allowing to choose the delay in seconds between 2 interrogations of the Wes server
index.md.Si vous diminuez cette valeur et constat: If you decrease this value and experience system sluggishness or instability, revert to the default value
index.md.Configuration de l'équipement serveur We: Configuration of the Wes server equipment
index.md.permet d'ajouter un nouveau serveur Wes: allows you to add a new Wes server
index.md.Après avoir créé votre équipement serveu: After having created your Wes server equipment, click on it to access the access configuration as well as the equipment / functionalities management
index.md.Renseignez les informations générales de: Fill in the general information of the equipment then indicate whether you have optional equipment connected to the Wes such as a screen or a 9-volt power supply for measuring the mains voltage by checking the corresponding boxes
index.md.Ensuite, renseignez les informations d'a: Then, fill in the access information to the Wes server in HTTP in order to be able to communicate with him
index.md.adresse IP sur laquelle le serveur Wes e: IP address on which the Wes server can be reached
index.md.port sur lequel le serveur Wes est joign: port on which the Wes server can be reached
index.md.identifiant permettant de communiquer en: identifier used to communicate in HTTP with the Wes server
index.md.mot de passe permettant de communiquer e: password used to communicate in HTTP with the Wes server
index.md.intègre un fichier spécialement conçu po: includes a file specially designed for Jeedom and allowing access to more data than those normally available by default
index.md.Il est nécessaire d'établir une connexio: It is necessary to establish an FTP connection with the Wes server to transfer this file, the following fields must therefore be completed as well
index.md.identifiant permettant de communiquer en: identifier used to communicate in FTP with the Wes server
index.md.mot de passe permettant de communiquer e: password used to communicate in FTP with the Wes server
index.md.cocher la case pour utiliser le fichier: check the box to use the Jeedom CGX file
index.md.Une fois les informations de connexion F: Once the FTP connection information has been entered, click on this button to immediately transfer the file to the Wes
index.md.Les informations de connexion au serveur: Connection information to the Wes server can be viewed from the Wes internet interface in the menu
index.md.va vous permettre de sélectionner les fo: will allow you to select the features of the Wes to activate / deactivate
index.md.création automatique de l'équipement cor: automatic creation of the corresponding equipment
index.md.suppression automatique de l'équipement: automatic deletion of the corresponding equipment
index.md.De retour sur la page générale du plugin: Back to the plugin's general page
index.md.les équipements activés précédemment son: previously activated devices are grouped by server and sorted in accordion menus classified by type of functionality
index.md.Le champ de recherche permet la visualis: The search field allows immediate visualization of the required equipment
index.md.Sur la droite, l'icône en forme de croix: On the right, the cross-shaped icon cancels the search, the open folder unfolds all the menus and the closed folder folds the whole
index.md.Il est possible de réorganiser chaque me: It is possible to reorganize each menu in the list by remaining clicked on it while positioning it at the desired location
index.md.Comme à l'habitude, le clic sur un équip: As usual, clicking on an item of equipment takes you to its configuration page, allowing you to enter general information and view the list of orders
index.md.Certains équipements sont dotés de param: Some devices have additional configuration parameters that must be entered when activating them
index.md.Ces paramètres peuvent être le type de m: These parameters can be the type of measurement to be taken for current clamps
index.md.ou la formule d'abonnement électrique co: or the electric subscription formula concerning teleinfo for example
index.md.D'autres peuvent concerner la sélection: Others may relate to the selection of a specific type of hardware in order to customize the illustrative images of the equipment such as the type of pulse meter
index.md.ou le type de pince ampèremétrique utili: or the type of current clamp used
index.md.Sur chaque page d'équipement (y compris: On each equipment page (including the Wes server equipment) there is, at the top right, a blue button named
index.md.qui permet d'ouvrir l'interface internet: which allows you to open the web interface of the Wes server in a new tab of your browser
index.md.En fonction du type d'équipement sur leq: Depending on the type of equipment you are on, you will be automatically redirected to the interface page corresponding to this feature
index.md.L'équipe travaille d'ores et déjà à l'in: The team is already working on the integration of the currently unsupported Wes extensions such as the 8 relay or modbus extension and will do its best to develop the plugin in this direction as soon as possible
